description: This file provides a utility class for encoding and decoding lists of Note objects to and from JSON strings, enabling persistence, backup, or export/import functionality.

classes.name: NoteJsonCodec
classes.description: A utility class with static methods for encoding and decoding Note lists to/from JSON strings.

methods.name: encodeList
methods.description: Encodes a list (Iterable) of Note objects into a JSON string.

methods.name: decodeList
methods.description: Decodes a JSON string into a list of Note objects.
